body: Carol Anne Hilton, MBA@Hesquiaht28 Nov 2022#indigenomicsBC Mining Law Reform@reformbcmining28 Nov 2022It's been 3 years since the Declaration Act#DRIPAwas adopted. In this year's Action Plan, the government included reforming the Mineral Tenure Act. And yet it is fighting First Nations like Gitxaała in court over their challenge of this colonial-era law.#bcpoli1
